title: Towards a Survival-Based Cellular Assay for the Selection of Protease Inhibitors in <i>Escherichia coli</i>.
sentence: However, our method was modified to select potential protease inhibitors instead of substrates, which was done by replacing the GFP or CAT in the selective substrate for a toxic protein, the controller of cell death B (ccdB) protein (Uniprot Q52042).
